name: Collateral
blurb: 'Collateral' is an open world, vehicular combat game for PC, set in a cyberpunk, dystopian future.

rewards.reward: FARE EVADER: For early backers only! A digital copy of Collateral upon release, our undying gratitude, and a 'special thanks' credit.
GHOST RIDE: A digital copy of Collateral upon release, and our undying gratitude.
SHORT BLOCKER: Early access to the game, a digital copy of Collateral upon release, our undying gratitude, and a 'special thanks' credit.
SMOOTH RIDE: Digital soundtrack, early access to the game, a digital copy of Collateral upon release, our undying gratitude, and a 'special thanks' credit.
SCENIC ROUTE: Digital art book, digital soundtrack, early access to the game, a digital copy of Collateral upon release, our undying gratitude, and a 'special thanks' credit.
FUZZY DICE: Collector's Edition: Includes early access to the game, a digital copy of Collateral upon release, digital art book, digital soundtrack, and a Collateral Kickstarter Campaign t-shirt.
GIVE 'EM THE TOUR:  Receive everything in the Fuzzy Dice Collector's Edition, as well as a limited edition Collateral poster signed by the team at Dancing Dinosaur Games.

TOWN CLOWN: Custom in game billboard, plus Fuzzy Dice Collector's Edition:\r\nHave your very own billboard featured in our game! Billboards are a prominent feature in our environment; we even plan to incorporate missions that involve tagging specific billboards. This is your chance to contribute something to the world of Collateral. Your custom billboard will be designed following a Skype consultation with one of our artists, and is subject to the approval of development team. We reserve the right to refuse any offensive or inappropriate material. Advertisements for real world companies or products are not permitted.

BUZZ BOX: Design a custom cab skin, 'Producer' credit, and Fuzzy Dice Collector's Edition: Add your own unique flair to the Collateral cab. Want to see the cab rocking a rainbow paint job? Well, this is your opportunity to truly customise your ideal cab!Your custom skin will feature as a selectable option in the game. Following a Skype consultation, a skin will be created based on your specifications. Designs are subject to the approval of development team. We reserve the right to refuse any offensive or inappropriate material.\r\n\r\nAlso receive a 'Producer' credit on our game.

BELLS & FLAGS: Be (or design) a minor character in the game, 'Producer' credit, and Fuzzy Dice Collector's Edition:
Ever wanted to see yourself in video game form? Here's your chance! After providing us with the necessary reference material, our artists will do their voodoo magic and your stylised likeness will appear in the game as a randomly occurring customer. If, however, you would prefer not to personally appear in the game, you can consult with one of our artists to help design your own character instead. If circumstances permit, we may even have you voice your character too!

Also receive a 'Producer' credit on our game.

GAS GUZZLER: Be a major recurring character in the game (faction contact), 'Executive Producer' credit, and Fuzzy Dice Collector's Edition: 
Experience the unique opportunity to become a major character in a video game! After providing us with the necessary reference material, our artist's will do their voodoo magic and your stylised likeness will appear in the game as a recurring faction contact. If, however, you would prefer not to personally appear in the game, you can consult with one of our artists to help design your own character instead. If circumstances permit, we may even have you voice your character too!

Also receive an 'Executive Producer' credit on our game.
HARD ROCK CAB: Limited edition hand painted 3D model of the Collateral Cab (with certificate of authenticity), 'Executive Producer' credit, and Fuzzy Dice Collector's Edition.

GAS GUZZLER 2.0: Be a major recurring character in the game (faction contact), 'Executive Producer' credit, and Fuzzy Dice Collector's Edition: Experience the unique opportunity to become a major character in a video game! After providing us with the necessary reference material, our artist's will do their voodoo magic and your stylised likeness will appear in the game as a recurring faction contact. If, however, you would prefer not to personally appear in the game, you can consult with one of our artists to help design your own character instead. If circumstances permit, we may even have you voice your character too! Also receive an 'Executive Producer' credit on our game.
